ctx: intros s a c pl l Hmap Hneq.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "None" in the current goal.

ctx: intros s a c pl l Hmap Hneq.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, c : ad pl, l : prec_list Hmap : None = Some l Hneq : a <> c Unable to unify "Some l" with "MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a pl) c".

ctx: intros s a c pl l Hmap Hneq.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros s a c pl l Hmap Hneq.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros s a c pl l Hmap Hneq.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable pl.

ctx: intros s a c pl l Hmap Hneq.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a0 p) c" in the current goal.

ctx: intros s a c pl l Hmap Hneq.
exceptions.exn: In environment a0 : ad p : prec_list a, c : ad pl, l : prec_list Hmap : MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a0 p) c = Some l Hneq : a <> c Heq : (a =? a0)%N = false Unable to unify "Some l" with "MapGet prec_list (MapMerge prec_list (M1 prec_list a pl) (M1 prec_list a0 p)) c".

original: intros s a c pl l Hmap Hneq. unfold union_mpl_0. unfold union_mpl_0 in Hmap. destruct s. - simpl in Hmap. rewrite Hmap. reflexivity. - destruct (a =? a0)%N eqn:Heq. + injection Heq as Heq'. subst. rewrite Hmap. reflexivity. + apply mpl_compat_7 in Hmap. rewrite Hmap. reflexivity.
